summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Community Development Block Grant Float Loan Program; authorizing a short-term loan of up to Two Million Five Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($2,550,000) in Block Grant funds to Rose & Associates, L.L.C., a Washington limited liability company, doing business as Hilltop Red Apple Market, for an economic development project involving the refinancing of existing debt on the Hilltop Red Apple Market.
